CustomField.description: Field used for VVS (Vista Value Selling) Closing Plan.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Have I surfaced—and can we meet—all of their purchase requirements (e.g., Procurement, Finance, IT, Legal)?
CustomField.label: Purchase Process: Purchase Requirements

value.fullName: 1 - I've just started capturing this information
value.label: 1 - I've just started capturing this information

value.fullName: 3 - We can meet all key purchase requirements
value.label: 3 - We can meet all key purchase requirements

value.fullName: 0 - We cannot meet enough of their purchase requirements
value.label: 0 - We cannot meet enough of their purchase requirements
